name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Lindon Edward JOHNSON, Appellant

judges: Before ZAPPALA, C.J., and CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
Chief Justice ZAPPALA and Justice CAPPY and NIGRO dissent.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Lindon Edward JOHNSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Chief Justice ZAPPALA and Justice CAPPY and NIGRO dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: David B. Keeffe, for Lindon Edward Johnson, appellant.
Todd K. Hinkley, Hallstead, Stephen G. Downs, Robert Bruce McGuinness, Towanda, for Com. of Pa., appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
813 A.2d 641
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Lindon Edward JOHNSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 3, 2002.
Decided Dec. 27, 2002.
David B. Keeffe, for Lindon Edward Johnson, appellant.
Todd K. Hinkley, Hallstead, Stephen G. Downs, Robert Bruce McGuinness, Towanda, for Com. of Pa., appellee.
Before ZAPPALA, C.J., and CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
